attachment.heading: AUTHORIZATION FOR FISCAL YEAR 2018-2019 BUDGET MODIFICATION NO. 1

para.text: The current FY 2018-2019 Annual Budget, prior to this enactment, is as follows:
The Council hereby approves Budget Modification No. 1 to the FY 2018-2019 Annual Budget, which consists of the following:

para.heading: GF – Education (10-xxxx-100-188-19):
para.text: Reallocate funds greater than 10% and add donations from Pueblo Opera Program.

para.heading: SRF – Tewa Donation (20-xxxx-750-850-18):
para.text: Budget Increase in the amount of $4,096.00: Add donations for the Education Department made in memory of Margaret Siebel for children and youth Tewa language and culture programming.

para.heading: SRF – Chamiza (20-xxxx-750-768-18):
para.text: Reallocate funds received for Tewa Language Program from the Chamiza Foundation.

text.em: Modification Approval Sheets (packets) for each of the above listed budgets are attached.

para.text: Budget Modification No. 1 results in an increase to the General Fund in the amount of $12,826.06.
Budget Modification No. 1 results in an increase to the Special Revenue Fund in the amount of $4,069.00.
There are no changes to the Capital Projects Fund.
